text:
I’m currently testing setting up a CloudFront reverse proxy for my HubSpot hosted website by following this guide <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/reverse-proxy-support>

I have a test setup working but the problem I’m having is that I can no longer access certain hubl variables on the `request` object like `{{ request.cookies }}`. Is there any way to get this working?

And when I print out `{{ request.headers }}` I don’t get the headers from CloudFront, I get this instead
`{x-hs-smart-content-ip=209.249.60.146, user-agent=CosIndex PreRendering HubSpot bot}`
